alert.message: This is an alert for drop in kinesis ingestion rate.
alert.name: Kinesis Span Collector- drop in kinesis ingestion rate

alert.message:
This is an alert for increase in kinesis lag (ms).

Troubleshooting steps:
1. check kafka health
2. check kinesis traffic and read success
3. check collector's cpu and memory
4. try increasing cpu / memory and/or no. of pods
alert.name: Kinesis Span Collector- increase in kinesis lag
